title: Bomboloni (Homemade Nutella Donuts)
description: Made with simple ingredients in your own home, these Homemade Nutella Donuts will change your life. You won't be ordering donuts to-go anymore!

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Into a mixing jug, add Whole Milk (3/4 cup) and Active Dry Yeast (2 Tbsp) . Mix until yeast is dissolved. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Into the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a dough hook, add All-Purpose Flour (4 cups) , Granulated Sugar (1/3 cup) , and Eggs (2) . Mix until well combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Slowly add the milk and yeast mixture. Continue mixing until incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the Butter (1/4 cup) half at a time, then add Salt (1 pinch) and Vanilla Essence (1 splash) . When dough comes together, remove it to a lightly floured surface.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Knead the dough for a bit and form it into a ball.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Cover the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Roll out the dough. Cut circles for your donuts, whatever size you choose.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Cover donuts with a dish towel and let rest for 1 hour.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: In a pot, heat Frying Oil (as needed) 340 degrees F (170 degrees C). You want enough oil to completely cover the donuts. Add donuts and cook until golden brown. Remove and set aside to cool.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Coat donuts with Granulated Sugar (to taste) and pipe full of Nutella® (to taste) . Serve and enjoy!

title: The Rock Pancakes
description: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson knows his food! His famous coconut banana pancakes are packed with protein and good fats! And what's more, they are absolutely delicious - a great way to start your day right!

all.name: Unsalted Butter  , melted   plus more to butter griddle
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil Cooking Spray    for griddle

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Sift All-Purpose Flour (2 cups) and Baking Powder (1 Tbsp) into a large bowl. Add Granulated Sugar (3 Tbsp) , Sea Salt (1/2 tsp) , and Unsweetened Shredded Coconut (2/3 cup) . Mix lightly with a wooden spoon.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a separate bowl, whisk Eggs (2) , Coconut Water (1 cup) , Coconut Milk (1 cup) , Whole Milk (3/4 cup) , Vanilla Extract (1 tsp) , Coconut Oil (2 Tbsp) , and Unsalted Butter (2 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Make a well in the center of the flour mixture and pour in the egg and milk mixture. Mix lightly to combine. Leave the batter clumpy, don’t overmix.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add Bananas (2) to the batter. Stir lightly to distribute evenly.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Heat the lightly oiled griddle to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) or frying pan on medium, using a combination of Extra-Virgin Olive Oil Cooking Spray (as needed) and butter.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Pour the pancake batter onto the griddle. Use 1 cup-sized ladle or measuring cup for large cakes, and 1/4 cup for small. Cook for 2-3 minutes on one side until the top of the pancakes has bubbles.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Flip carefully with a thin spatula. Cook until brown and crisp, for another  2-3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Transfer to plate or platter and serve immediately with your choice of toppings.

title: Easy Venezuelan Cachapas (Corncakes with Cheese)
description: This classic Venezuelan corncake filled with cheese is delicious and easy to make. These go great with some beers or a cold fruit smoothie, making them an awesome summer snack.

all.name: Frozen Corn Kernels  , thawed   or Canned Corn

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, add the Frozen Corn Kernels (2 3/4 cups) , Eggs (2) , Milk (3.5 oz) , Harina P.a.n.® White Corn Meal (2 Tbsp) , Granulated Sugar (1 Tbsp) , and Salt (1 tsp) . Place it in a blender or if using a stick blender, blend until all the corn kernels are broken down.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Let the batter rest in the fridge for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Heat a pan, then wipe lightly with some oil on a napkin. Add 2 spoonfuls of the cachaca batter to the center of the pan and spread out slightly. Cook for 4-5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: You'll start to notice bubbles forming on the surface, that's when its time to flip. Cook for 3 more minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: After cooking the other side for around 3 minutes, add the Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Ball (to taste) on one side of the top. Fold the cachaca over and serve warm. Feel free to add a little butter to the top before serving!

title: Spanish Eggs with Tomatoes and Asparagus
description: These Spanish Eggs with Tomatoes and Asparagus are truly incredible. It's the kind of dish you will keep coming back to time after time because it's just that good. Best served with a crusty baguette to soak up all that tasty sauce!

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Thinly slice Garlic (3 cloves) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Finely dice Onion (1/2) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Wash Asparagus (20 stalks) and pat them dry. Cut into 1-inch pieces.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Chop the Fresh Parsley (1 handful) .

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Into a fryinh pan over medium heat, add Extra-Virgin Olive Oil (2 Tbsp) . Let warm for 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add the garlic and onion. Mix well with the oil and cook for about 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Add the asparagus and cook for another 4 minutes, then season with Spanish Smoked Sweet Paprika (1/2 tsp) , Sea Salt (1 pinch) , and Ground Black Pepper (1 pinch) . Mix it all together.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Add Canned Diced Tomatoes (1 1/2 cups) and Granulated Sugar (1 pinch) . Mix it all together, then taste and adjust seasonings. Bring to a simmer and cook for 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Crack Organic Eggs (4) into the sauce and place a lid on the pan. Cook for 3-4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Remove the lid and transfer the pan away from the heat. Season with additional salt and pepper. Garnish with the parsley and serve directly from the pan. Enjoy!

title: Grilled Peanut Butter & Apple Sandwich
description: This grilled peanut butter & apple sandwich includes plenty of protein, fiber and other good nutritional values to keep you running and happy. I set out to put this into the collection as a nice twist on the old classic PB & J.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Wash your Apples (2) and slice in half. Using a teaspoon, scoop out the core. Remove any area from the stem and calyx (bottom indentation) of the apple.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place sliced apple half in standing position and cut into 1/4 inch slices. You should get 3 or 4 slices per half, depending on the size of your apple. Cut the slices in half, vertically.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add a nice layer of Nut Butter (to taste) to both slices of your Bread (4 slices) .

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Layer one slice with apples, sprinkle with Ground Cinnamon (to taste) and add a light drizzle of Maple Syrup (to taste) over top.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Place top half bread on sandwich.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Grease your griddle/skillet with Coconut Oil (as needed) and heat over medium. You can also add a very light coating of coconut oil to the top of your bread slice using a silicon brush, or whatever method you prefer.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Place sandwich, oil side down, and cook for about 2 - 4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Brush top half lightly with coconut oil, flip and cook another 2 - 4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Remove from heat and serve with any remaining fresh apple slices on the side.

title: Spring Inspired Detox Salad
description: I wanted to share this specific spring salad recipe with you because it contains so many incredible naturally detoxifying ingredients that contain so many health benefits!

all.name: Scallions  , finely chopped   2 scallions per 2 servings

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine Fresh Spinach (2 cups) , Radicchio (1) , Granny Smith Apple (1) , Carrots (3) , Radishes (1 bunch) , Walnuts (1/2 cup) , Canned Chickpeas (3/4 cup) and Scallions (1 bunch) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add in Sea Salt (1/2 tsp) . Toss together excluding avocado.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Whisk together Extra-Virgin Olive Oil (1/2 cup) , Apple Cider Vinegar (1/2 Tbsp) , Honey (1 Tbsp) and Garlic (1 clove) . a small bowl. Give it a taste test. If you like it sweeter, add a touch more honey. If you like more vinegar, add a touch more apple cider vinegar.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Toss dressing with salad and top with Avocado (1) . Serve and enjoy!

title: Asian Vegetable Frittata
description: This Asian Vegetable Frittata is one filling breakfast. It's truly amazing the ways you can diversify this recipe - it is one of those healthy dishes you want to keep in your back pocket at all times. Served with some buttered toast, it will keep you satisfied well past lunchtime.

title: Southwestern Egg Omelet
description: This very traditional Southwestern omelet is perfect for breakfast with some buttery toast. It also easily makes a nice light lunch or dinner if served with a garden salad. Yes, sheer perfection!

all.name: Deli Ham  , chopped, divided   or Deli Turkey
Nonstick Cooking Spray    for coating the ramekins

title: Scrambled Eggs with Curry Tomatoes
description: This amazingly tasty, spiced breakfast scramble will give you the boost you need to get your day started right.

title: Breakfast Burritos
description: Tasty breakfast burritos in under 10 minutes! Quick, easy, and super customizable. Just think about all the possibilities - different fillings for every day of the week!

title: Everything Fathead Bagels
description: Missing the soft and chewy bagels on your keto diet? Look no further! Here's the classic fathead dough recipe, tweaked to make some pretty-darn-good bagels! We sprinkled Everything Bagel Seasoning over the top, but feel free to get creative with your bagel flavors!

all.name: Almond Flour    plus additional as needed

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a microwave-safe bowl, heat the Shredded Mozzarella Cheese (3/4 cup) and Cream Cheese (2 Tbsp) in a microwave oven for 1 minute. Stir the mixture and microwave again for 30 more seconds, until melted.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the Almond Flour (3/4 cup) and Egg (1) , and season with a generous pinch of Salt (to taste) . Mix together gently until completely combined.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: If the dough is sticky, sprinkle it with a little extra almond flour. Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and place it in the refrigerator for 10 minutes to firm up (or freezer for 5).

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Divide the dough into 6 balls and roll each out into a log.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Spray a donut pan with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) and wrap the dough around the tin’s indentations. Sprinkle with the Everything Bagel Seasoning (1 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake the bagels in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, until golden brown. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week.

title: Keto Bagels
description: Just a few ingredients needed to make these gluten-free, low carb bagels with almond flour fathead dough. They are easy, chewy, and delicious! If you want Keto bagels that are also gluten-free and taste great, you're going to love these!

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and line a baking tray with baking paper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the Mozzarella Cheese (1 1/2 cups) and Butter (1/4 cup) into a microwave-safe bowl. Place this into a microwave oven on high for 2 minutes or until melted and gooey.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Into a large bowl, add Instant Dry Yeast (1/2 Tbsp) and Stevia (1/2 Tbsp) . Pour the Water (2 Tbsp) and mix well, until it starts to bubble and foam. Leave to stand for 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add Almond Flour (1 cup) , Baking Powder (1 tsp) , and Salt (1/2 tsp) to the yeast mixture. Gently mix everything together with a butter knife. You'll end up with a sticky dough.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the Xanthan Gum (1/2 Tbsp) , Eggs (2) , and the melted cheese mixture. Mix everything together, and wet your hands if you're handling the dough as it's quite sticky. Leave the dough to proof and rise for 30 minutes in a warm area.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: If making the topping, mix White Sesame Seeds (1 Tbsp) , Black Sesame Seeds (1 Tbsp) , Poppy Seeds (1 tsp) , and Garlic Salt (1/2 Tbsp) together in a bowl. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: The dough should have doubled in size by now. Using wet hands, take pieces of dough, roughly the size of small hamburger buns, and place on the lined baking tray. Flatten them slightly, and make a big hole in the middle, as they expand when baking.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Brush the bagels with the Egg (1) , and sprinkle them with the sesame seed mixture. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Bring it out of the oven and leave to rest for 5 minutes before serving. Store in an airtight container, if saving for later. They're also great if you freeze them! Cooking results may vary depending on microwave oven used.

title: Quick Blueberry Pumpkin Seed Oatmeal Bowl
description: An easy and energizing breakfast bowl packed with fiber, healthy fats, good carbs, and probiotics!

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Into a large bowl, add Old Fashioned Rolled Oats (1/3 cup) , Wheat Bran (2 Tbsp) , and Ground Flaxseed (1 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Stir, then add enough Water (to taste) to cover the grains.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and cook in a microwave oven for 2 minutes. After cooking, the oats should be nice and creamy.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Mash the Banana (1/2) . Add it to the bowl of oats and stir it in.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Top your oatmeal with Blueberry Kefir (2 Tbsp) , Pumpkin Seed Butter (1 tsp) , Fresh Blueberries (1/4 cup) and Kiwifruit (1/2) . Serve it up!

title: Cranberry and Coconut Breakfast Yogurt Parfait
description: Combine plain low-fat Greek yogurt, cranberries, and coconut for a protein-packed Greek yogurt parfait breakfast.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add the Frozen Cranberries (1 cup) , Bananas (1/2 cup) , Unsweetened Coconut Flakes (1/3 cup) , Oranges (1 1/3 cups) , Vanilla Extract (1 1/4 tsp) , and Maple Syrup (1 1/2 Tbsp) to the jug and blend on Speed 5 for 50 seconds.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Divide the Granola (1 cup) , Greek Yogurt (to taste) and smoothie in alternating layers in glasses

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Top with extra granola, Unsweetened Coconut Flakes (to taste) , orange segments and drizzle with Honey (to taste) . Serve immediately. Enjoy!

title: Sweet Potato Energy Squares
description: These Sweet Potato Energy Squares are a chewy delight loaded with nuts, coconut, dates, pumpkin seeds, flax, and warm spices! Perfect for breakfast on the go or a snack.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Pierce the Sweet Potato (1) all over with a fork and put it on a microwave-safe plate. Cook in a microwave oven for 5 minutes or until tender. Let it cool enough to handle, then cut it in half and scoop out 1/2 cup of filling from the skin.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Into a food processor, add the sweet potato, Pitted Dates (12) , Walnuts (1 cup) , Slivered Almonds (1 cup) , Pumpkin Seeds (1/4 cup) , Unsweetened Shredded Coconut (1/4 cup) , Ground Flaxseed (1 tsp) , Ground Cinnamon (1 tsp) , Ground Nutmeg (1/2 tsp) , and Vanilla Extract (1/2 tsp) . Pulse it together until you have a mixture that is fine but still has some texture.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Line an 8x8-inch pan with parchment, leaving a little hanging over the edge. Press the mixture firmly into the pan so that it sticks together well.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Refrigerate the tray for at least 3 hours or up to overnight.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Lift the firmed up mixture out of the tray and cut it into 9 squares by making two equal cuts both horizontally and vertically. Serve immediately, or store in an airtight container for a few days. Enjoy!

title: Vegan Oatmeal Peanut Butter Jelly Pancakes
description: Love PB & J? These Vegan Oatmeal Peanut Butter Jelly Pancakes make the perfect weekend treat! Makes around eight 3.5-inch pancakes.

Oatmeal PB & J Pancakes.name: Almond Milk    or other non-dairy milk
Grape Jelly    or jelly/jam of choice

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Mix Almond Milk (1 cup) , Ground Oats (1 cup) , Oats (3/4 cup) , Granulated Sugar (3 Tbsp) , Baking Powder (1/2 tsp) , Baking Soda (1/2 tsp) , and Vanilla Extract (1/2 tsp) in a bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Heat frying pan to medium-high or griddle to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pour about 1/4 cup size pancakes and cook 2-3 minutes on the first side. Flip and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until golden.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Heat Creamy Peanut Butter (1/4 cup) and Grape Jelly (1/4 cup) separately in a microwave oven until warm, about 30 seconds each.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: For coconut whipped cream, beat Coconut Cream (1 can) with mixer and add Powdered Confectioners Sugar (1 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Drizzle PB & J over pancakes and top with coconut whipped cream and any other desired toppings. Enjoy!

title: Sweet Potato Quinoa Patties
description: These are such amazing and healthy baked sweet potato quinoa patties that are really satisfying and easy to make! Perfect for a light summer lunch or dinner.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Line two sheet trays with silicone mats.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Bring the Vegetable Stock (2 cups) to a low boil in a big saucepan on the stove, then stir in the Quinoa (1 cup) . Cover the pan and turn the heat to low. Let it cook until tender for 15 to 20 minutes. Fluff it up with a fork. While cooking, you can work on the sweet potato.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pierce the Sweet Potatoes (2) all over with a fork and place them on a microwave-safe plate. Cook in a microwave oven for 10 minutes on high.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Then turn them over and microwave them for another 5 minutes. They should be completely soft.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Scoop the sweet potato flesh out of the skin into a bowl and stir it well with the cooked quinoa. Then stir in the Dried Onions (1 tsp) , Garlic Powder (1 tsp) , Dried Parsley (1 tsp) , Salt (1/2 tsp) , Ground Cumin (1/2 tsp) , Paprika (1/2 tsp) and Ground Cinnamon (1/2 tsp) to flavor it well.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Use wet hands to form 10-12 patties out of the mixture, depending on how big you want them. Evenly lay them out on the sheet trays and bake them for 30 minutes or until set and slightly crisp along the edges.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Loosen them from the tray with a spatula and serve them immediately however you want! They are great simply served with ketchup or HP sauce, topped with avocado, or like a vegetarian burger!

title: Rosemary Cheddar Muffins
description: These Savory Rosemary Cheddar muffins are warm and flavorful! They’re packed with nutritious yumminess and won’t disappoint!

all.name: Medium   Sweet Potato  , peeled, quartered   about 1 cup
Spinach Leaves  , washed, roughly chopped   about 2 cups
Soy Sauce    or Tamari, Coconut Amines, or Liquid Amino
Shredded   Cheddar Cheese    plus a little to sprinkle on top of the muffins

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Set oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C), grease muffin tin.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the Sweet Potato (1) in a microwave-safe bowl, and cook it in a microwave oven on high for 10 minutes, or until soft.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add Olive Oil (1 Tbsp) to the bowl of potatoes and mash.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Heat medium skillet over medium-low heat, add remaining Olive Oil (1 Tbsp) Add Onion (1) to skillet and sauté 10 minutes or until onions are translucent.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add Garlic (3 cloves) and Spinach Leaves (1/2 bunch) , sauté until spinach is wilted, 1 to 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine Whole Wheat Flour (1 1/2 cups) , Ground Flaxseed (1 Tbsp) , Fresh Rosemary (1 Tbsp) , Sage Leaves (1 Tbsp) , Salt (1 tsp) , Baking Powder (1 tsp) , Baking Soda (1/2 tsp) , and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, add Egg (1) and beat slightly, then add Water (1/2 cup) , Soy Sauce (1 Tbsp) , Cheddar Cheese (1/2 cup) , sweet potato, onion, and garlic and spinach mixture.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Slowly add the egg-vegetable mixture to the flour mixture, stirring as you add, until thoroughly combined (don’t overmix!)

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Spoon batter into muffin tins filling until full, but not overflowing. Sprinkle a little cheese on the top of each muffin.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Bake muffins for 25-30 minutes, or until muffins are brown and an inserted toothpick comes out clean. Enjoy!

title: Sweet Potato Biscuits
description: These sweet potato biscuits are flaky, buttery, slightly sweet, and amazing! They're so perfect on the side of any meal.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: First, prepare the Sweet Potato (1) . Pierce it all over with a fork and place it on a microwave save plate. Cook it in a microwave oven for 5-6 minutes to make it tender enough to mash.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: When it is cool enough to handle, cut the sweet potato in half and scoop the flesh right out of the skin into a bowl. Add the Maple Syrup (1/2 tsp) into the bowl and mash it all together well until smooth. Set the bowl aside so the sweet potato can cool completely.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Combine the All-Purpose Flour (2 cups) , Dark Brown Sugar (2 Tbsp) , Baking Powder (1 Tbsp) , Pumpkin Pie Spice (1/2 tsp) , and Salt (1/2 tsp) . Whisk it all together, making sure there are no lumps.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add in the Butter (1/3 cup) and use a pastry blender to cut it into the flour mixture. It will become pebbly.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Then stir in the Heavy Cream (3 Tbsp) and cooled mashed potato just until it comes together into a dough. Bring it together into a ball and turn it out onto a clean, lightly floured surface. Knead the dough for just 3 or 4 turns to make it soft and uniform. Press it down and pat it out gently to be a disc about an inch thick.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Use a biscuit cutter to cut out the biscuits as close together as possible. Then take the scraps and press them out again into a smaller disc and cut out as many more as possible. I got 9 out of my dough.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Transfer the cut out biscuits to the lined sheet tray and bake them for about 15 minutes. They should get golden around the edges.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: When they're done, take them out and let them cool for a few minutes. Transfer them to a rack to finish cooling. These babies are best served the day they are baked but will keep for a day in a sealed container. Enjoy!

title: Black Pepper Cherry Granola Bars
description: These Black Pepper Cherry Granola Bars are a simple, healthy snack for bringing on the go to your summer adventures! These healthy granola bars are so easy to make and the ingredients are so simple you probably already have them.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine Old Fashioned Rolled Oats (2 cups) , Almonds (3/4 cup) , Dried Cherries (1/2 cup) , Pumpkin Seeds (1/4 cup) , and Finely Ground Black Pepper (1/4 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a microwave-safe bowl, combine Almond Butter (1/2 cup) and Honey (1/4 cup) , then heat in a microwave oven for 30 seconds, or until hot and pourable.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Gently combine hot almond butter mix with the dry oat mix.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Line a 9x13-inch dish with parchment paper and spoon your granola mixture in. Press firmly so that the granola is really compact.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Pop granola in the freezer for 15 to 30 minutes to firm up, then cut into 9 to 12 bars.

title: Rosemary Flatbread with Goat Cheese and Prosciutto
description: This flatbread highlights the sweet berry flavor that reminds me of stolen raspberries, mountains, and contrasts that sweetness against salty, fresh flavors for a perfect treat.

all.name: Sea Salt Flakes    or Table Salt

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) with a heavy baking sheet on rack in middle.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Once the oven is warm, remove the baking sheet, cover in parchment paper, and lay the Prosciutto (4 slices) flat on the paper. Bake for 8 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Remove the prosciutto and place it on a paper towel to cool. Cover the baking sheet with aluminum foil. Add some Olive Oil (as needed) to the baking sheet, and return the baking sheet to the oven.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Stir together the All-Purpose Flour (1 2/3 cups) , Fresh Rosemary (1 Tbsp) , Baking Powder (1/2 tsp) , Sea Salt Flakes (1 pinch) , and Ground Black Pepper (1/2 tsp) in a medium bowl.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Make a well in the center, then add Water (1/4 cup) and Olive Oil (1 fl oz) and gradually stir into flour with a wooden spoon until a dough forms. Knead dough gently on a floured work surface 4 or 5 times.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Divide the dough into 2 pieces. Roll out the first piece with a floured rolling pin to approximately 8x11 inches. Repeat with the second portion of the dough.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Once the dough is rolled out, lightly brush the top with additional oil and sprinkle with sea salt or table salt. Sprinkle with sea salt. Slide the rolled out dough onto a preheated baking sheet and bake until pale golden and browned in spots, 8-10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: While the dough is baking, heat the Raspberry Preserves (1/3 cup) until the liquid is in a microwave oven for approximately 1:30 minutes. Crumble or tear the cooled prosciutto into small pieces.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Once the flatbread is baked, spread the Goat Cheese (1/3 cup) and sprinkle crumbled prosciutto and ribbons of Fresh Basil Leaves (12) on top of the cheese. Repeat with the second flatbread. Drizzle the raspberry preserves on top of your lovely flatbreads and serve.

title: Tater Tot Cups with Egg & Cheese
description: Tater tots mashed into a muffin pan, filled with cheddar cheese and eggs, then baked until the eggs reach your desired done-ness.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Defrost the Frozen Tater Tots (50) in a microwave oven for a minute or two. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place 4 or 5 tots in each cup. Mash with a back of spoon to line the bottom and sides of each cup. Add 1 tablespoon of Shredded Cheddar Cheese (3/4 cup) into each cup. Place in oven and bake 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Remove the muffin pan from oven and break an Eggs (12) into each cup. Sprinkle a little more cheese on top of each egg. Bake 12 to 15 minutes until white and yolk are set and the eggs reach to your desired doneness.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Remove from oven and use a rubber spatula to loosen the edges and bottom of each tater tot cup. Transfer the cups to a serving platter. Sprinkle with Ground Black Pepper (to taste) and Scallions (to taste) . Serve and enjoy!

title: Healthier Seven Layer Energy Bars
description: These Healthier Seven Layer Bars are loaded with toasted rice cereal, peanut butter, and dates, then topped with butterscotch, dark chocolate, and pecans!

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add pitted Medjool Dates (1 cup) with Sea Salt (1/8 tsp) to the bowl of a food processor, and process for 10 to 15 seconds or until a thick paste is formed.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Then add the Creamy Peanut Butter (1 cup) and Almond Milk (2 Tbsp) to processed dates and process until creamy.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Remove the creamy mixture from the food processor bowl, add to a microwave-safe bowl and heat in a microwave oven for 20 seconds, stir, and microwave again another 20 to 30 seconds or until the mixture is a warm, thin consistency.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the Vanilla Extract (1 tsp) and Banana (1/2) and stir well. Then slowly add the Gluten-Free Toasted Rice Cereal (5 cups) to the warm smooth mixture and stir until thoroughly combined.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) , then add the toasted rice cereal mixture to dish, smooth into even flat layer, using spatula to press mixture down firmly.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add Butterscotch Chips (1/2 cup) and Almond Milk (1 Tbsp) to a small sauce pan and heat on low, stir consistently until smooth and creamy.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Poor over bars and spread into even thin layer.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Rinse sauce pan, then add Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips (1/2 cup) and repeat same process as butterscotch, add milk again if needed, once chocolate has melted, drizzle over butterscotch layer.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle the bars with Coconut Sugar (1 Tbsp) and Chopped Pecans (1/2 cup) and place them in the fridge for 1½ -2 hours or until firm. You may also put them in the freezer for 30 minutes if you need them to be ready sooner.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Remove the bars 10 minutes before serving and cut into 24 servings. Store in the refrigerator.

title: Veggie Breakfast Burrito
description: Enjoy this healthy easy meal for your next breakfast or brunch option.

all.name: Flour Tortillas    or Gluten Free Tortillas
Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend    I used Clover® Organic Shredded Three Cheese Mexican Blend

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large saute pan, heat Olive Oil (1/2 Tbsp) over medium heat. Add chopped Onion (1/2) and chopped Bell Pepper (1/2) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cook onions and peppers, stirring occasionally, until crisp and tender for about 3 to 4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add Fresh Baby Spinach (2 cups) and toss to wilt. Remove from heat and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Crack Large Eggs (4) into a small bowl.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Mix in Half and Half (2 Tbsp) until blended.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Heat remaining Olive Oil (1 tsp) in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add egg mixture and move around in the pan with rubber spatula until soft scrambled. Remove from heat.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend (1/2 cup) on each Flour Tortillas (2) and heat in a microwave oven for 40 to 45 seconds to melt. Remove and lay flat on a countertop or cutting board.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Spoon half of the egg mixture and some of the veggie mixture in the center of the tortilla over the melted cheese. Add Salsa (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Top with diced Avocados (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: To wrap the burrito, start by folding the sides toward the center, partially covering the filling. Next, fold the end closest to you over the filling and sides and roll snugly.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Serve and enjoy!

title: Buttermilk Blueberry Breakfast Cake
description: This cake is a long-time family favorite. My mother made it for my siblings and me when we were young, and every time I pull it out of the oven, clichè as it sounds, I am reminded of summer mornings in my childhood kitchen. It’s simple, adaptable, and make aheadable.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Using a stand mixer or hand-held mixer, cream the Unsalted Butter (1/2 cup) with the zest of the Lemon (1) and Granulated Sugar (1 cup) until light and fluffy.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the Egg (1) and Vanilla Extract (1 Tbsp) and beat until combined.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, toss the Fresh Blueberries (2 cups) with 1/4 cup of the All-Purpose Flour (2 cups) . In another bowl, whisk together the remaining flour, Baking Powder (2 Tbsp) and Kosher Salt (1 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add half of the flour mixture to the batter, and stir with spatula to incorporate. Add all of the Buttermilk (1/2 cup) . Stir. Add remaining flour, and stir until flour is absorbed. Fold in the blueberries. Leave excess flour from the blueberry bowl behind.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Grease an 8 or 9-inch square baking pan with butter or coat with non-stick spray. If you have parchment paper on hand, line the pan with parchment on top of the butter. Spread the batter into the pan. Sprinkle the batter with the Granulated Sugar (1 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake for 35 to 45 minutes — a 9-inch pan will be done in closer to 35 minutes; an eight-inch pan usually needs 40 to 45 minutes. Check with a toothpick for doneness. If necessary, return pan to oven for a couple of more minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Let cool at least 15 minutes before serving.

title: Orange and Autumn Olive Pancakes
description: Autumn olive berries and orange, a perfect complement to pancakes that are packed with bright flavor.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Combine All-Purpose Flour (1 cup) , Baking Powder (1/2 Tbsp) , and Salt (1/2 tsp) in a large bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In another bowl combine Egg (1) and Unsalted Butter (2 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Zest the Orange (1) and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Squeeze orange into a 1 cup measuring cup and add Milk (as needed) to make 1 cup of liquid. Pour into egg and butter mixture and mix well.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and stir just until incorporated. Fold in Autumn Olive (1/4 cup) and the orange zest.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Pour about a half cup of batter into a cast iron skillet set over medium heat. Cook both sides until lightly browned.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve with maple syrup and enjoy!

title: Fully Loaded Breakfast Potato Mug
description: Running late or lacking a stove? This recipe is for you. Potatoes topped with bacon, cheese, sour cream, and green onions.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Onto a paper towel-lined plate, add the Bacon (2 pieces) , and heat in a microwave oven for 4 to 6 minutes until crispy.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Wash and quarter the Red Potatoes (4) . Into a mug, add the potatoes and Water (1/4 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Microwave for 6 to 8 minutes or until potatoes are fork tender.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Drain off the excess water.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Into the mug, add Salt (1/2 tsp) , Ground Black Pepper (1/4 tsp) , and Garlic Powder (1/4 tsp) . Mix everything together with a spoon.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Top with crumbled bacon.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle in the Shredded Cheddar Cheese (1 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Heat in a microwave oven for 30 seconds to let the cheese melt.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Top with Sour Cream (to taste) and Scallions (to taste) . Serve immediately and enjoy!

title: Smoky Broccoli Spinach and Cheddar Frittata
description: Fluffy, smoky, packed with veggies! This Smoky Broccoli Spinach Cheddar Frittata is great for breakfast, lunch or dinner! To make it dairy-free, use stock instead of milk and omit or use dairy-free cheese.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Set oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, combine Organic Eggs (10) , Milk (1 cup) , Salt (1 tsp) , Smoked Paprika (1 tsp) , Fresh Thyme (1 tsp) and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) . Whisk until combined, set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Heat cast iron skillet (or other oven-proof skillet) over medium heat. Add Olive Oil (1 Tbsp) , once warm, add Garlic (4 cloves) and Onion (1/4) and sauté for 5 minutes. Add Broccoli (3 heads) , sauté another 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Then and Spinach Leaves (1/2 bunch) and sauté just until spinach starts wilting. Sprinkle Cheddar Cheese (1/2 cup) over the broccoli spinach mixture.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Once it starts melting, pour egg mixture over broccoli mixture, sprinkle a bit more cheese over top and cook just until the sides start setting, for 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Put skillet in oven and bake for 20 minutes. You can also test doneness by cutting into the center, if egg runs into the cut, cook for another couple minutes. Once cooked, remove from heat and enjoy!

title: Lemon Chia Seed Muffins
description: These light and wholesome Lemon Chia Seed Muffins are the perfect treats for weekend mornings, breakfast on the go, or an afternoon snack when you crave something sweet. I love the light-lemon classic flavor, but I’m a little crazy about chia seeds. SideChef tip: we recommend using the Panasonic 4-in-1 Microwave Oven to make this recipe, click here to find out more.

all.name: Lard    I used Armour® Premium All-Natural Lard

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine the All-Purpose Flour (1 3/4 cups) , Granulated Sugar (1/2 cup) , Chia Seeds (3 Tbsp) , Lemons (1 1/2 Tbsp) , Baking Powder (1 tsp) , Baking Soda (1 tsp) , and Salt (1/2 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, slowly heat the Lard (1/3 cup) in a microwave in 5-second increments. Brush the bottom, sides, and edges of each muffin tin with some of the melted lard. Set the lard aside and let it cool.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the Sour Cream (1 cup) , Large Egg (1) , Lemon Juice (1 Tbsp) , Vanilla Bean Paste (1/2 Tbsp) , and melted lard until creamy.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Fold the wet mixture into the dry mixture and stir until lightly moistened. Do not over stir. If the batter is too dry, add Milk (3 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Evenly spoon the muffin batter into the prepared muffin tins. Bake for 18 minutes, until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the middle comes clean.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Cool for 1 minute in the pan on a wire cooling rack. Carefully remove the muffins and continue cooling on the rack.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Stir together the remaining Lemon Juice (2 Tbsp) , Vanilla Bean Paste (1/2 tsp) , and Powdered Confectioners Sugar (1/2 cup) until smooth. Drizzle the glaze over the muffins.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Serve and enjoy!

title: The Fluffiest Pancakes
description: This recipe come from Matty Matheson of Parts & Labour in Toronto, which he did for Munchies. Check out the video on YouTube-it's dope, but not nearly as dope as these puppies.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Melt the Butter (2 Tbsp) in the microwave and set aside to cool. Sift the All-Purpose Flour (3 cups) , Baking Powder (1/2 Tbsp) and Baking Soda (1/2 Tbsp) into a mixing bowl. Add the Granulated Sugar (1/4 cup) and Salt (1 pinch) , then mix.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Separate your Eggs (4) , and in a medium mixing bowl, and beat the egg whites until nice and frothy. Continue whisking and add the Buttermilk (2 cups) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a separate bowl, whisk egg yolks until blended. Add Granulated Sugar (1 Tbsp) and stir to incorporate. Add the cooled, melted butter slowly into the egg yolks. Then, whisk the egg yolk mixture into the egg whites until incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Slowly whisk the flour mixture into the wet mixture so that no clumps form. Whisk through to a fluffy consistency and refrigerate for ten minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a large skillet, generously squirt Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) into the pan over a medium-high heat.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: With a large spoon, place a cookie-sized portion of batter into the pan. Be careful not to touch as the will be hot! If you want to add more to the pancakes, add Fresh Blueberries (to taste) or Bananas (to taste) at this point.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Let them cook until you see bubbles forming in the middle and a nice browning on the sides,  and then it’s time to flip.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Wait until it is nice and brown on the other side, about a minute and plate. Or place on a pan inside a warmed oven, while you cook the remainder.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Now get your stacks together, add plenty of butter and Maple Syrup (to taste) . Now get grimey with your fat stacks!

title: Hong Kong Style French Toast
description: Hong Kong style French toast typically has a thick layer of peanut butter and a drizzle of condensed milk. In my version however, I like to add some mozzarella cheese and use maple syrup instead.

all.name: Whole Wheat Bread    or Any Bread Toast
Maple Syrup    or Condensed Milk, Golden Syrup

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Remove the crusts from the Whole Wheat Bread (2 pieces) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Spread a layer of Peanut Butter (2 Tbsp) on one slice.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add some Shredded Cheese (2 Tbsp) and place the two slices of bread together.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a bowl, beat the Egg (1) , Milk (1 Tbsp) , Vanilla Extract (2 dashes) , and Salt (1 pinch) together.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Soak both sides of bread in the egg mixture.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a pan over medium heat, heat a good layer of Vegetable Oil (as needed) . Cook on each side until golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Transfer into a plate and top with some Unsalted Butter (to taste) . Serve with either Maple Syrup (to taste) or condensed milk. Golden syrup works well too!

title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Banana Muffins
description: These Banana Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Muffins are the perfect breakfast muffin! Made with mashed bananas, and oats and sweetened with maple syrup these muffins will be a hit with the entire family.

all.name: Avocados    or melted and cooled Coconut Oil

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees F). Grease a muffin tin with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) or line with muffin liners.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add Bananas (2) , All-Purpose Flour (1 1/2 cups) , Baking Powder (1/2 Tbsp) , Salt (1/2 tsp) , Avocados (1/4 cup) , Eggs (2) , Ground Cinnamon (1 tsp) , Maple Syrup (1/2 cup) , and Oats (1/2 cup) to a large bowl.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Mix everything to combine, then fold in the Chocolate Chips (1/2 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Evenly distribute the batter throughout the muffin tin, filling each cup almost to the top, about 3/4 way full. Sprinkle additional oats and chocolate chips on the top of each muffin, if desired.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake the muffins for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Allow them to cool on a cooling rack for about 15 minutes and enjoy!

title: Spinach, Scallion, & Feta Frittata
description: Spinach, scallions, feta and eggs make a fabulous breakfast, or for a low carb lunch serve this frittata with a Greek salad on the side.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven on the broiler setting.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Chop the Scallions (1 bunch) , separating the whites and greens.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Crumble the Feta Cheese (1/3 cup) . Roughly chop the Fresh Spinach (2 3/4 cups) , removing any stiff stems.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, beat the Eggs (6) , with a whisk for 3-4 minutes. Add the Ground Black Pepper (1 tsp) and Sea Salt (to taste) to the eggs and whisk for another minute.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Heat a 10-inch oven-safe frying pan over medium heat. Add Butter (1 Tbsp) and tilt the pan until butter coats the bottom. Cook spinach for 2-3 minutes until it has wilted and collapsed in size. Add scallions and cook for 2-3 more minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Pour in egg mixture and quickly stir so the spinach and scallions are evenly distributed. From this point on, do not stir the mixture. Sprinkle the Feta Cheese evenly over the top of the eggs.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Once the edges of the frittata are cooked (they’ll be lighter in color and look solid), place the frying pan on a middle rack in the oven. Broil for 6 minutes, watching very closely so that it doesn't burn.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Once the frittata is starting to turn golden-brown and is puffing up, remove from the oven and allow to cool for 2-3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Cut the frittata into six wedges and serve immediately.

title: Spinach Ricotta Pie
description: This savory spinach and ricotta pie mixes soft ricotta cheese with fresh baby spinach on a bed of crunch puff pastry and is not only delicious, it's also easy to make!

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Put the Ricotta Cheese (2 cups) into the bowl and begin to break it down using a fork.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add Fresh Baby Spinach (4 cups) and a generous handful of Pecorino Romano Cheese (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Mix together well and add a sprinkle of Salt (to taste) and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) and a touch of Ground Nutmeg (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add an Egg (1) and mix together once again.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Once the ingredients are mixed and the filling looks much creamier, it is ready.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Line a baking dish with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) and Puff Pastry (2) , and prick the bottom of it using a fork so it helps it to cook through.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Fill it using the ricotta mixture and even it out as much as you can using a spatula.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Cover the pie with another sheet of puff pastry, angling it so that the edges cover any gaps.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Create a crust by gently folding down the edges and joining the two layers together.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Press down around the edges using the teeth of a fork.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Beat an Egg (1) lightly in a small cup and add a drop of water.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Brush the egg mix over the top of the pie using a pastry brush.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Cook in the oven at 180 degrees C (350 degrees F) for 40 minutes or until golden.

tasks.title: Step 14
tasks.instruction: Let the spinach ricotta pie rest and cool for up to ten minutes, then slice into triangular serves and place on a wooden board. Enjoy!

title: Baked Chocolate Donuts
description: Easy recipe for Baked Chocolate Glazed Donuts. These donuts are made lighter by baking instead of frying, and they're dipped in a rich, chocolate glaze.

all.name: Chocolate Icing    or Your Favorite Icing

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (160 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Melt the Unsalted Butter (3 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Whisk All-Purpose Flour (1 cup) , Unsweetened Cocoa Powder (1/4 cup) , Baking Powder (1/2 tsp) and Salt (1/4 tsp) together.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a separate bowl, combine Milk (1/2 cup) , Dark Brown Sugar (1/2 cup) , Egg (1) , melted unsalted butter and Vanilla Extract (1 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Pour flour mixture into milk mixture and mix until incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Grease donut pan and fill 2/3 full, and bake for 13 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Let cool for a minute in pan and then turn out onto a wire rack. Dip into Chocolate Icing (to taste) and Sprinkles (to taste) .

title: Corn and Bacon Quiche
description: All the goodness of eggs and is stuffed with bacon, corn, peppers, and onions. Oh yes, and lots of cheddar cheese. It also has a hash-brown crust making it gluten-free as well. It’s a high quiche with lots of filling that envelops the potato crust making it very hearty and great for brunch, lunch or dinner.

all.name: Frozen Shredded Hash Browns  , thawed, lightly packed

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Brush a 9 1/2-inch deep dish (1 1/2 to 2 inches high) pie plate with Unsalted Butter (1 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pat dry Frozen Shredded Hash Browns (3 cups) with a paper towel if needed. Toss hash browns with remaining Unsalted Butter (2 Tbsp) and Kosher Salt (1/2 tsp)

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Press hash browns evenly into the pie plate and up the sides to form a crust. Using the back of a flat measuring cup helps to press it down.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake potato crust for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove from oven and reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, chop Bacon (5 slices) into 1/2-inch pieces and saute in a medium skillet until crisp. Remove to a paper towel-lined plate, reserving 1 tablespoon of bacon fat in the pan.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: To the same skillet add Onions (1/2 cup) and Red Bell Peppers (1/4 cup) and sauté until starting to soften, about 3-5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl whisk together Eggs (4) and Sour Cream (1/4 cup) until combined. Whisk in Half and Half (1 1/4 cups) , Dried Basil (1/2 Tbsp) , remaining Kosher Salt (3/4 tsp) , Ground White Pepper (1/2 tsp) and Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (1 pinch) .

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle the bacon, onion and red pepper evenly over the cooked potato crust. Top with an even layer of Frozen Corn Kernels (1 cup) and Cheddar Cheese (1 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Pour egg mixture evenly over everything. Shake gently to allow ingredients to settle.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Bake on the middle rack for 35-40 minutes. The center should jiggle just a little while the outer edges are firmer to the touch.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Allow the quiche to rest for 10 minutes prior to slicing. Slice into 6-8 wedges and serve immediately.

title: Turkey Breakfast Skillet with Chipotle Sauce
description: This Turkey Breakfast Skillet pairs juicy turkey sausage with tender diced potatoes, veggies, and sunny-side-up eggs for a breakfast that’s packed with flavor! Served with a creamy, smoky homemade chipotle sauce, it is a delicious and filling way to start your day!

Chipotle Sauce.name: Lemon  , juiced   1/2 tsp of juice needed

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat Olive Oil (1 Tbsp) in a large cast iron pan over medium heat. Add the Turkey Sausages (13 oz) into the pan and cook for 4 minutes until the turkey sausage is browned.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the Onions and Peppers (2 cups) and cook for an additional 4 minutes until the peppers are soft and the onions are slightly translucent.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the Frozen Diced Hash Browns (4 cups) , Salt (1 tsp) , Chili Powder (1 tsp) , Onion Powder (1/2 tsp) , and Ground Black Pepper (1/2 tsp) . Cook for 10 to 12 minutes until the potatoes are tender.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a separate skillet at medium heat, crack your Large Eggs (4) and cook the sunny side for 4 minutes until the whites turn opaque.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, add Sour Cream (1/2 cup) , Sriracha (1 Tbsp) , Olive Oil (1 tsp) , 1/2 tsp of Lemon Juice (1) , Chipotle Chili Powder (1/2 tsp) , Salt (1/4 tsp) , and Ground Black Pepper (1/4 tsp) . Mix until ingredients are combined.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: To serve, place the eggs on top of the potatoes, onions, and peppers. Enjoy with the chipotle sauce drizzled on top on served on the side.

title: Baked Samosas
description: The recipe presented here allows for freezing samosa for an extended time and fresh bake or air-fry them when needed. As always, here is my attempt to make this traditional and popular delicacy in a healthier way.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Take a large bowl and add Whole Wheat Flour (1 cup) , All-Purpose Flour (1 cup) , Almond Flour (1/2 cup) , Ajwain Seeds (1 tsp) , Salt (1 tsp) and Oil (1/4 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Mix well. Alternatively, use stand mixer with the dough hook and mix at the lowest speed.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Rub the flour and oil if making dough with hands, or mix the flour at the lowest speed setting of the stand mixture. The oil should be well incorporated in all of the flour. Do this for 3 to 4 minutes - you don’t want to rush this step.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Once incorporated, the mixture should be crumbly. Press some flour between your palm- it should form a shape and not crumble – means oil is enough and well incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Now, start adding Water (1/2 cup) , little by little and mix to form a stiff dough. It should just come together and form a stiff dough. I used around ½ cup of water here to get the right stiffness but you might need a little more or less.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Cover the dough with a moist cheesecloth/kitchen towel and let it rest until you are done making the filling (I usually soak a cheese cloth in water and then squeeze out all the water and cover the dough with that). While the dough is resting, let’s move on to preparing the filling.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Heat Oil (2 Tbsp) in a pan over medium heat. Once the oil is hot, add Asafoetida (1/8 tsp) , Cumin Seeds (1 tsp) , Fennel Seeds (1 Tbsp) and Whole Coriander Seeds (1 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Let the seeds sizzle for few seconds and then add Cinnamon Sticks (1/4 in) , Black Peppercorns (5) , Mixed Nuts and Seeds (1/4 cup) , Green Chili Pepper (1 tsp) and saute for 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Add the Potatoes (1 cup) , Paneer (1 cup) and Frozen Green Peas (1/2 cup) to the pan. Mix everything together.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Add Salt (1 tsp) , Red Chili Powder (1/2 tsp) , Ground Coriander (1/2 tsp) , Garam Masala (1/4 tsp) and Mango Powder (1 Tbsp) . Mix to combine.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Lastly, add Fresh Cilantro (2 Tbsp) . Remove pan from heat and let the filling cool down.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: While the potato filling is getting cool, take out the rested dough on a flat surface. Knead the dough few more times using knuckles and form one long log of dough.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Divide the dough into 5 equal parts and keep aside.

tasks.title: Step 14
tasks.instruction: Take one piece of dough, keep the remaining dough portions covered at all times with a moist cloth or cling wrap else the dough will dry out and roll it between your palms to make a round ball, place it on rolling board and flatten it out by pressing with heal of your palm.

tasks.title: Step 15
tasks.instruction: With a rolling pin, roll it out around 8-9 inches in diameter and then cut it into 4 equal parts.

tasks.title: Step 16
tasks.instruction: Take one triangular part and apply water on the curvy edge/side. Then make two slits on each side, making sure to not cut all the way.

tasks.title: Step 17
tasks.instruction: Now place one Tbsp of potato filling in the middle, making sure to not overfill it.

tasks.title: Step 18
tasks.instruction: Bring one end of the watered edge in the middle and press firmly so that both layers stick. Now bring the other end to the center and press again firmly.

tasks.title: Step 19
tasks.instruction: Place on a baking sheet. Repeat the same process with remaining pieces and rest of the dough. As you go making them remember to keep the filled samosa covered with a kitchen towel so that the crust doesn’t dry out. Leave some gap between them without overcrowding.

tasks.title: Step 20
tasks.instruction: When ready to bake, preheat the oven at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 21
tasks.instruction: Bake the samosa for 18 minutes, then carefully flip all of the samosas and bake for another 6 minutes. Baking time and temperature need to be adjusted according to your oven.

title: Pumpkin Carrot Loaf Bread
description: What better way to entice your kids with bright orange bread than this healthy Pumpkin Carrot Loaf Bread in the morning for breakfast? It is a nice sweet bread on its own without any spread to go with, but I reckon you should bring it up a notch by making it into French Toast served with some strawberry jam for that extra special weekend brunch.

all.name: Eggs    1 egg plus 1 Tbsp water for egg wash
Salted Butter  , softened   plus more melted

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a blender, combine the Pumpkins (3/4 cup) together with Carrot Juice (1/2 cup) and blend together.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the pumpkin and carrot juice mixture, Egg (1) , Milk Powder (2 Tbsp) , Granulated Sugar (2 Tbsp) , Bread Flour (2 1/3 cups) , Instant Dry Yeast (1 1/2 tsp) , and Salted Butter (2 Tbsp) into a breadmaker.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Set your breadmaker to "sweet bread", weight to "500g", and crust to "light setting" to start the machine. The machine will start to operate and knead the dough

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Let the machine run until the timer indicator reaches around 2 hours and 40 minutes. The machine will give a light beep sound which indicates to us that it is time to add our melon seeds.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Optionally (but I highly recommend) when the timer indicator reaches around the 1 hour 25 minute mark, take out your bread dough and also the machine's dough hook.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Quickly, press the dough onto a clean surface to remove all the air bubbles out and roll it into a nice smooth ball.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Carefully put the dough back into the pan and let the dough proof for another 40 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Then, for that perfect look, brush a lightly beaten Egg (1) mixed with 1 Tbsp water and sprinkle the Melon Seeds (1/2 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Let the machine run its thing until it finishes the setting. Once baked, remove the bread from the tin immediately and let it cool on a wire rack while you brush some melted butter over the top for a nice shiny finish.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Slice it up and serve.

title: Buttermilk Biscuits
description: These Biscuits are easy to make and perfect for family gatherings and birthday parties.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Into a large bowl, add and mix the All-Purpose Flour (2 cups) , Salt (1/2 tsp) , Granulated Sugar (2 Tbsp) , Baking Powder (1 Tbsp) , and Baking Soda (1/4 tsp) . Then, add in the grated Butter (1/2 cup) and mix everything well.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Once you have incorporated the butter, add in the Buttermilk (1 cup) and stir until combined. Then, by using your hand, bring the dough together.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: On a floured surface, flatten the dough with a rolling pin and form it into a 10 inch rectangle shape.  Then, using a cookie cutter, cut the dough into pieces.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Place the biscuits on a baking tray lined with baking paper, and bake under 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for about 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve and enjoy!

title: Christmas Ham and Cheese Pies
description: My Christmas Ham and Cheese Pies are great for Christmas parties or using up leftovers after Christmas. Puff Pastry is cut into circles and filled with shaved ham, chopped Brie cheese, and a little cranberry sauce. Baked until golden and puffed, these wonderful pies are best served warm. Easy to make, budget-friendly, and perfect for those who will only have a little bit of time for baking this holiday season.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Allow Puff Pastry (4) to thaw. Find a glass the size of the holes in the muffin tin for the tops of the pastries and a mug slightly larger than the holes for the bottoms.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Using the top of the glass, cut out 12 pastry tops. Using the mug and a knife, cut out twelve pastry bottoms.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Carefully place the pastry bottoms in the previously greased with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) muffin tin. Evenly distribute Ham (3.5 oz) between pastries, being careful not to overfill.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Chop Brie Cheese (7 oz) into small chunks and de-rind. Add a little bit of cheese to each pastry.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add a dollop of Cranberry Sauce (3 Tbsp) into each pastry. Be careful not to add too much as the sauce will melt and spread in the oven.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Carefully brush Egg (1) and wash around the edge of each pie. Seal each pie with the pastry tops and brush the top with egg wash.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Use a fork to make prick holes on the top of each pie. Place the pastries in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the pastries are golden and slightly puffed up.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Allow pastries to cool for about 10 minutes. Serve warm (but not too hot).

title: Baked Garlic Herb Polenta Squares
description: This is a fun spin on the classic Polenta by turning it into handy little baked garlic herb polenta squares. It is really simple to make and so flavorful too!

all.name: Olive Oil Cooking Spray    for dipping

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Get a medium saucepan and an 8 x 8 baking dish. Spray the baking dish with the Olive Oil Cooking Spray (as needed) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Then combine the Milk (2 cups) , Chicken Stock (2 cups) , Garlic (3 cloves) , Dried Parsley (1/2 tsp) , Dried Tarragon (1/2 tsp) , Salt (1 pinch) , and Dried Thyme (1/2 tsp) in the saucepan and bring the mixture to a gentle boil over medium high heat. Whisk it a few times to stir it all together.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Then slowly pour in the Polenta (1 cup) while you continue to whisk. Keep whisking while the polenta cooks for about 3 minutes. Once it is cooked, remove the pot from the heat and stir in the sauce and Asiago Cheese (1/4 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Spread the mixture into a packed, even layer in the baking pan and refrigerate it uncovered for 30 minutes. This will make it firm and set for baking.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: When the 30 minutes is almost up, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with foil. Spray the foil with more cooking spray. Take out the chilled tray of polenta and cut it into 12 squares. Remove them from the pan and transfer them to the baking sheet.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake them for 20-25 minutes until they become slightly crisp on the outside and creamy

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve immediately with Ketchup (to taste) or marinara for dipping!

title: Whole Wheat Banana Walnut Bread
description: With a few simple substitutions, this high-fiber alternative offers all the flavor and moistness of the original.

all.name: Nonstick Cooking Spray    or Coconut Oil Spray

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees (180 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Spray an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2-inch bread load with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) . Combine Whole Wheat Flour (1 2/3 cups) , Baking Powder (1/2 Tbsp) , and Salt (1 tsp) in a medium bowl. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In this order, add ingredients to the Vitamix: Egg (1) , Granulated Sugar (2/3 cup) , Unsalted Butter (1/4 cup) Non-Fat Milk (1/3 cup) , 1 tsp zest of the Lemon (1) , Bananas (2) , and Apple Sauce (1/4 cup) . Variable 1-5, 15 seconds or until mixed.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour the wet ingredients into the mixing bowl with dry ingredients and mix gently by hand or with a spatula to combine. Fold Walnuts (2/3 cup) in after the dry and wet ingredients are mixed, reserving some walnuts for topping later.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake for an hour, check if fully cooked with a toothpick. It is cooked when an inserted toothpick comes out clean. Let it cool and serve.

title: Mini Breakfast Pizzas
description: Enjoy your pizza and salad all at the same time with these delicious breakfast treats. They’re not served side by side as you might expect. The lemony peppery salad is piled on top of the fresh-from-the-oven crispy egg-adorned pizza so that every bite of this deliciousness is loaded with texture and flavor.

all.name: Lemon  , zested, freshly squeezed   2 tsp of zest and juice needed, plus more for serving
Grated Parmesan Cheese    plus more for serving, if desired

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Let Pizza Dough (12 oz) stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Divide dough into 4 pieces.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place a pizza stone or large baking sheet in the oven. Preheat to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Leave the stone in the oven as it preheats.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Dust the surface with All-Purpose Flour (as needed) , roll each piece of dough into a 6 to 7-inch circle. Pierce liberally with the tines of a fork.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Carefully arrange 2 dough circles on the hot pizza stone. Bake for 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Remove from oven, and flip so that the cooked side is facing up. Set aside. Repeat with the remaining 2 dough circles.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Stir together Cheese (1 cup) and 2 tsp of Lemon Zest (1) in a medium bowl. Divide the ricotta mixture evenly among the cooked sides of dough circles.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle evenly with Kosher Salt (1/8 tsp) , and Freshly Ground Black Pepper (1/8 tsp) . Top each dough circle with 1 of the Large Eggs (4) and 1 Tbsp of Grated Parmesan Cheese (1/4 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Working in 2 batches, return topped dough circles to the hot pizza stone. Bake in the oven until egg whites are set and yolks are still a little runny, about 6 to 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: While the pizzas are baking, prepare the arugula salad. Whisk together the Extra-Virgin Olive Oil (1/2 Tbsp) , 2 tsp of Lemon Juice, remaining Kosher Salt (1/8 tsp) , and remaining Freshly Ground Black Pepper (1/8 tsp) in a large bowl. Stir in the Baby Arugula (4 cups) so that the leaves are evenly coated.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Top each cooked pizza with about 1 cup dressed arugula. If desired, sprinkle a small amount of additional grated Parmesan over each along with a bit of lemon zest. Serve immediately.
